page.title: 08CUMBRIA POLICE H.Q PERSONNEL
page.content: {Officers}recruited at 18.5 years. Selected by physical criteria, a written test and necessary qualities of inteqrity and character.17 weeks basic{training,}14 at police college in Warrington. First 2 years of service on probation, subject to assessment. Cadets recruited at 17 years, on criteria as above.They work 1 month each in factory, hospital, geriatric home and on Outward Bound Course. Then 4 months at headquarters, remaining time attatched to a station. Special Constables are voluntary part-time assistants. Take oath of allegiance (like all officers). {23784}crimes recorded in a year.{11696 are detected. About 40 registered drugs addicts and 400 known drug users. Radio network controlled by and technicians employed by the Home Office.
